name: Curse of The Coder
description:
You are a game developer, fixing bugs.

Except... they don't stop. As if your whole code is haunted by them, they keep on appearing again and again-

Wait a moment, isn't that completley normal?

Shut up Bob, real programmers don't produce that much bugs.

 I wish...

Wait what do I actually do?

Just click where you think there is a spot that needs a fix

now stop bothering me Bob
